list.label: 装饰1
list.content:
<dv-decoration-1 style="width:100%;height:100%;"  v-bind="styleArr"  /> 
    
<script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      styleArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          ret['color']=[this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }        
        return ret
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.content:
<dv-decoration-2 :reverse="false"   style="width:100%;height:100%;"  v-bind="styleArr"  /> 
    
<script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      styleArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          ret['color']=[this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }
        console.info(ret)
        return ret
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.label: 装饰4
list.content:
<dv-decoration-4 :reverse="false"  style="width:100%;height:100%;"  v-bind="styleArr"  /> 
    
<script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      styleArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          ret['color']=[this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }
        ret['dur']=this.self.option.dur||3
        return ret
      }
    }
  } 
</script>

list.label: 动态环图
list.content:
<dv-active-ring-chart :config="{  
            data: Enumerable.from(cur_ds).skip(1).select(x=> { 
              return {'name':x[0],value:x[1]} 
            }).toArray()
,clor:colorArr
,radius:self.option.radius||'50%'
,activeRadius:self.option.activeRadius||'55%'
,lineWidth:self.option.lineWidth||20
,activeTimeGap:self.option.activeTimeGap||3000
,digitalFlopStyle:{  fontSize: self.option.style_fontSize||25,  fill:self.option.style_fill|| '#fff'}
,digitalFlopToFixed:self.option.digitalFlopToFixed||0
,digitalFlopUnit:self.option.digitalFlopUnit||''
,animationFrame:self.option.animationFrame||50
,showOriginValue:self.option.showOriginValue||false                 
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

  <script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      styleArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          ret['color']=[this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }        
        return ret
      },
     colorArr(){
        if(this.self.option.barColor)
          return Enumerable.from(this.self.option.barColor).select(x=> x.color1).toArray()    
        else return null
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.label: 胶囊柱图
list.content:
<dv-capsule-chart :config="{  
            data: Enumerable.from(cur_ds).skip(1).select(x=> { 
              return {'name':x[0],value:x[1]} 
            }).toArray()
              ,unit:self.option.unit||''
					,colors:colorArr||['#37a2da', '#32c5e9', '#67e0e3', '#9fe6b8', '#ffdb5c', '#ff9f7f', '#fb7293']
					,showValue:self.option.showValue||false
          }" 
:style="'width:100%;height:100%;color:'+(self.option.color||defaultsetting['COLOR'])" />
  <script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      styleArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          ret['color']=[this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }        
        return ret
      },
     colorArr(){
        if(this.self.option.barColor)
          return Enumerable.from(this.self.option.barColor).select(x=> x.color1).toArray()    
        else return null
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.label: 水位图
list.content:
<dv-water-level-pond :config=" {
            data: [<t>value</t>  ],
           		shape:self.option.shape||'rect',
               waveOpacity:self.option.waveOpacity||0.4,
               waveHeight:self.option.waveHeight||40,
               waveNum:self.option.waveNum||3 ,
                 formatter:self.option.formatter||'{value}%' ,
                colors:colorArr
                 
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />
<script>
  export default {
    computed:{
      colorArr(){
        let ret={}
        if(this.self.option.color1 && this.self.option.color2 && this.self.option.color1!='' && this.self.option.color2!=''){
          return [this.self.option.color1,this.self.option.color2]
        }        
        
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.label: 进度池
list.content:
<dv-percent-pond  :config="{
            value:Number( <t>value</t> )
				,borderWidth:self.option.borderWidth  ||3
,borderGap:self.option.borderGap  ||3
,lineDash:buildArr('lineDash')||[5,1]
,textColor:self.option.textColor  ||defaultsetting['COLOR']
,borderRadius:self.option.borderRadius  ||5
,localGradient:self.option. localGradient ||false
,formatter:self.option. formatter ||'{value}%'
,colors:buildArr('color')||['#3DE7C9', '#00BAFF']
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

<script>
  export default {
    methods:{
      buildArr(para){
        if(this.self.option[para+'1'] && this.self.option[para+'2'] 
           && this.self.option[para+'1']!='' && this.self.option[para+'2']!=''){
          return [ this.self.option[para+'1'],this.self.option[para+'2'] ]
        }
      }
    }
  }
</script>

list.label: 飞线图
list.content: <dv-flyline-chart :config="config" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

list.label: 飞线图增强版
list.content: <dv-flyline-chart-enhanced :config="config" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

list.label: 锥形柱图
list.content:
<dv-conical-column-chart :config="{
            data:Enumerable.from(cur_ds).skip(1).select(x=> { 
              return {'name':x[0],value:x[1]} 
            }).toArray()
            ,fontSize	 :self.option.fontSize	 ||12
            ,imgSideLength:self.option.imgSideLength||	30
            ,columnColor	 :self.option.columnColor	 ||'rgba(0, 194, 255, 0.4)'
            ,textColor	 :self.option.textColor	 ||defaultsetting['COLOR']
            ,showValue	 :self.option.showValue	 ||	false
				,img	 :self.option.img	 ||	[]
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

list.label: datav数字翻牌器
list.content:
<dv-digital-flop :config="{
number: [Number( <t>value</t> )],style: {
fontSize:self.option.fontSize||30,
  fill: self.option.fill||'#3de7c9' },
    content	:self.option.content  ||''
      ,toFixed	:self.option.toFixed  ||0
        ,textAlign:self.option.textAlign  ||'center'
          ,rowGap:self.option.rowGap  ||	0
            ,animationCurve:self.option.animationCurve  ||'easeOutCubic'
              ,animationFrame:self.option.animationFrame  ||50

}" 
            style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

list.label: 轮播表
list.content:
<dv-scroll-board :config="{
            header: cur_ds[0],
            data: cur_ds.slice(1)
,rowNum	       :self.option.rowNum	       || 5        
,waitTime	   :self.option.waitTime	   ||  2000    
,carousel	   :self.option.carousel	   ||  'single'
,unit	       :self.option.unit	       ||  ''      
,sort	       :self.option.sort	       ||  true              
,rowNum	       :self.option.rowNum	     ||  5         
,headerBGC	   :self.option.headerBGC	 ||  '#00BAFF' 
,oddRowBGC	   :self.option.oddRowBGC	 ||  '#003B51' 
,evenRowBGC	   :self.option.evenRowBGC	 ||  '#0A2732' 
,waitTime	   :self.option.waitTime	 ||  2000      
,headerHeight	:self.option.headerHeight||  35        
,index	       :self.option.index	     ||  false     
,indexHeader	:self.option.indexHeader||  '#'        
,carousel	   :self.option.carousel	 ||  'single'  
,hoverPause	   :self.option.hoverPause	 ||  	false   
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;" />

list.label: 排名轮播表
list.content:
<dv-scroll-ranking-board :config="{
            data: Enumerable.from(cur_ds).skip(1).select(x=> { 
              return {'name':x[0],value:x[1]} 
            }).toArray()
,rowNum	       :self.option.rowNum	       || 5        
,waitTime	   :self.option.waitTime	   ||  2000    
,carousel	   :self.option.carousel	   ||  'single'
,unit	       :self.option.unit	       ||  ''      
,sort	       :self.option.sort	       ||  true    
          }" style="width:100%;height:100%;color:defaultsetting['COLOR']" />
